text: <!here|@here> As you’ve probably seen already the dev team has all day (as in 8hr, not the app) Agile workshops scheduled with Adidas & Thoughtworks next week Tuesday-Thursday (and first half of Friday) in NW Portland.
We’ve coordinated with Thoughtworks to ensure we can head back to 811 for All Hands on Wednesday and Little Friday on Thursday.
Please let me know if you have any questions, the details of the schedules are still being penciled in.
